Metadata.title: StarryCiels
Metadata.description: StarryCiels is a sandbox-style space exploration game that leverages Solana Blockchain and Metaplex technologies to introduce a new form of Web3 gaming that is easily accessible for both players and developers. The game allows players to own planets (Planet NFTs), explore, gather resources, build, develop, and enjoy many other supporting features.

Theme.description: Choose the theme color you want to change.

Language.description: Choose the language you want to change.

Website.ig-description: Each resource represents a player's digital asset data, which can harvest limited resources from the planet they control.
Website.cm-q2: Is there a limit to how many Planet NFTs I can mint?
Website.cm-q5: What technology does StarryCiels use to develop its games?
Website.cm-q6: How can I stay updated on StarryCiels and community events?
Website.cm-a1: StarryCiels is sandbox & space exploration Game NFT on Solana Blockchain.
Website.cm-a2: No strict limit per buyer, let's find ensure rarity and value for our Planet NFTs.
Website.cm-a3: StarryCiels presents games and NFTs entirely in Pixel Art style. Additionally, it features a wide variety of attributes and innovative randomization, ensuring that you'll be excited about minting new Planet NFTs.
Website.cm-a4: Press Play button on top website, and connect Solflare Wallet.
Website.cm-a5: Solana Blockchain, Metaplex, Solflare Wallet, IPFS and React Flow for Gameplay
Website.cm-a6: Follow our official X account, join our Discord server, and subscribe to our YouTube channel for the latest updates.

Profile.description-create: This wallet does not have a profile
